summary: A complete crafting area with lots of storage, mannequins, and growing area. The Total package armory for creating what you need for your character's travels through Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Skip to below for !!!Update v1.2!!!
Skip to below for !!!Update v1.1!!!

Watch The Video.
This mod adds a Spell Tome Placed on the desk of the mage in Dragonsreach in Whiterun. This Tome teaches you a spell that will teleport you to The Elementary Armory, a complete armory with..
Every Crafting table
Over 20 mannequins
Area for growing and cooking
Lots of storage space
Smelter
Weapon racks
All Standing stones
All Blessing Stones
Bookshelf

Everything is in the same room for easy access. You can also Fast travel from inside TEA.
The Spell is an Alteration spell.
This is my first mod so i hope you enjoy and get some use out of it.
ANY FEEDBACK COMMENTS WOULD BE HELPFUL IF IT WORKS FOR YOU AS DESCRIBED. Thanks.
This mod was made with
skyrim.esm
hearthfire.esm
update.esm
And Skyrim v1.9.32

!!v1.1 update!!
This update is to try and make sure everyone has at least one way that works for them to get to TEA :)

-A Second tome has been added that teaches a second new reworked teleport Spell (The Elementary Armory II),
so try that if the first one does not work. It is on the desk of the wizard in Dragonsreach as well.
They both should be under Alteration in you magic menu.
-A New Door at the entrance to riverwood has been added. It takes you to The Elementary Armory as well.. It Is also connected with the main door of TEA and can be used to exit.
(See pics on Nexus mod page)
just in case both spells and the door do not work for you..
try console command coc 001EA, and remember you can always fast travel out of TEA.
-The Tome has a value of 0 now so you dont have to "Steal" it.

!!v1.2 update!!

-Small update to fix bad loading point for door.
-Added Skyforge. Bad Placement, but its there and i can make it pretty.. later if need be.

Future Updates..
Navmesh so Mannequins will stay in place for those having problems.
A Green room for pics
author: Kagus max
